description:
Keroro tries to create a tokusatsu character show based on the Keroro Platoon characters!  But all does not go according to plan.  The newspaper club is also interested in who`s really beneath those costumes...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro Keroro Show / Fuyuki & Chiruyo KGS Returns
ケロロ ケロロショー / 冬樹 & 散世 KGS再び
